title: Private functions does not support argument as an empty byte array
body:
### Version Information

* vyper Version (output of `vyper --version`): 0.1.0b11+commit.595d183
* OS: Linux 4.19.49-1-MANJARO
* Python Version (output of `python --version`): 3.73
* Environment (output of `pip freeze`):

### What's your issue about?

I've created a private function with fixed byte array as a parameter, but every time I passing an empty byte array to the function then it will cause stack underflow error.

Contract `store.vy`:
```python
storage: bytes[10]

@private
def store(_bytes: bytes[10]):
    self.storage = _bytes

@public
def proxyStore(_bytes: bytes[10]):
    self.store(_bytes)
```

Test script
```python
from eth_tester import EthereumTester
from web3 import Web3
from web3.providers.eth_tester import EthereumTesterProvider
from vyper import compiler


w3 = Web3(EthereumTesterProvider(EthereumTester()))
w3.eth.defaultAccount = w3.eth.accounts[0]
owner = w3.eth.accounts[0]

with open("contracts/store.vy") as f:
    source_code = f.read()

compiled_contract = compiler.compile_code(source_code, ["abi", "bytecode"])

contract_address = deploy(w3, compiled_contract)

contract = w3.eth.contract(address=contract_address, abi=compiled_contract["abi"])
contract.functions.proxyStore(b'').transact({'from':owner})
```

Returns:
I've tested with 2 backends `eth-tester` and `ganache-cli`

With `eth-tester` returns:
```
*** eth.exceptions.InsufficientStack: ('Wanted 1 stack item, only had %d', 0)
```

With `ganache-cli` returns:
```
*** ValueError: {'message': 'VM Exception while processing transaction: stack underflow', 'code': -32000, 'data': {'0x69740217236fcfe0ab885379675e47a52030989fee21b03c2470038f30f69448': {'error': 'stack underflow', 'program_counter': 576, 'return': '0x'}, 'stack': 'o: VM Exception while processing transaction: stack underflow\n    at Function.o.fromResults (/app/ganache-core.docker.cli.js:10:82299)\n    at /app/ganache-core.docker.cli.js:47:151756\n    at /app/ganache-core.docker.cli.js:47:128087\n    at b (/app/ganache-core.docker.cli.js:47:127744)\n    at /app/ganache-core.docker.cli.js:47:127797\n    at t.default (/app/ganache-core.docker.cli.js:52:259867)\n    at /app/ganache-core.docker.cli.js:47:128711\n    at _.n.emit (/app/ganache-core.docker.cli.js:61:1063005)\n    at /app/ganache-core.docker.cli.js:61:1701802\n    at /app/ganache-core.docker.cli.js:61:1701825\n    at /app/ganache-core.docker.cli.js:61:351481\n    at /app/ganache-core.docker.cli.js:2:69007\n    at i (/app/ganache-core.docker.cli.js:2:84062)\n    at /app/ganache-core.docker.cli.js:2:64530\n    at process._tickCallback (internal/process/next_tick.js:61:11)', 'name': 'o'}}
```


But this problem not happen when I change the function to be public function.
```python
@public
def store(_bytes: bytes[10]):
    self.storage = _bytes
```
@SAYONG I think this was resolved in master which was just released as beta-11. Can you try again against that?

Beta-11 is not working for me :(
Still got the same error.
Seems to work just fine, closing. @SAYONG please re-open if you have the same problem
